sentences.en: Her disposition was vivacious, and she liked this self - reliant , self - sufficient , straight spoken boy.
sentences.cn: 她的性格很活泼, 她喜欢这个独立自主 、 自命不凡 、 说话直爽的男孩子.

sentences.en: Her eyes had remain young and vivacious.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛非常年轻,炯炯有神.

sentences.en: His action was alternatively vivacious and sullen.
sentences.cn: 他的举动时而轻松愉快,时而阴沉古怪.

sentences.en: I cannot give at second hand any impression of his vivacious delivery.
sentences.cn: 他的叙述绘声绘色,他的原话经我一转述就要大为减色.

sentences.en: I remember how impressed I was with her vivacious and captivating warmth.
sentences.cn: 她活泼动人的热情深深感染了我.

sentences.en: Past retirement age, the diminutive Dr. Lin is as vivacious as ever.
sentences.cn: 身体瘦小的林大夫,虽然已过了退休年龄, 可是她和过去一样,仍精力充沛.

sentences.en: She made reasonable progress, entertained for me a vivacious though perhaps not very profound affection.
sentences.cn: 她有了适当的进步, 对我怀着一种虽不很深却还热烈的爱.

sentences.en: Slender , pretty and vivacious, she was the apple of her parents'eyes.
sentences.cn: 她苗条美丽,活泼大方, 是父母的掌上明珠.

sentences.en: The autumn air , blithe and vivacious, elated Philip.
sentences.cn: 秋天的空气愉快而舒畅, 使菲利浦意气风发.

sentences.en: The vivacious girl made a good cheer-leader.
sentences.cn: 这个充满活力的女孩做了啦啦队队长。

sentences.en: Their manners were still more vivacious than before.
sentences.cn: 他们的举止也比以前更生动.

sentences.en: We celebrated this occasion by a vivacious luncheon and then returned to Whitehall.
sentences.cn: 我们以一顿愉快的午餐来庆祝这件事,然后就回白厅去了.

words.tran_cn: 给与生气；赋予生命；苏醒
使生动；使活跃；给与生气

trans.tran_en: someone, especially a woman, who is vivacious has a lot of energy and a happy attractive manner – used to show approval
